sentences.en: A condor caught the little kangaroo. 4, Son shot at the condor.
sentences.cn: 一只秃鹫过来抓住了小袋鼠. 儿子向秃鹫射去.

sentences.en: A lone condor soared above the andean peaks.
sentences.cn: 一只孤独无伴的大秃鹫翱翔在安第斯山峰的上空.

sentences.en: Access to files ( input and output ) is handled through Condor's remote system call mechanism.
sentences.cn: 对文件 ( 输入和输出 ) 的访问通过Condor的远程系统调用机制来控制.

sentences.en: An Andean condor fliesover the Colca canyon at the Colca valley in Arequipa, south of Lima, on January 30, 2011.
sentences.cn: 2011年1月30日，利马南部城市阿雷基帕的科尔卡大峡谷，一直安第斯秃鹰正在展翅飞翔。

sentences.en: Condor always transfers both input and output files.
sentences.cn: Condor总是既传递输入又传递输出文件.

sentences.en: Condor makes certain that all requirements in both ClassAds are satisfied.
sentences.cn: Condor确保两类ClassAd中的所有需求都被满足.

sentences.en: Condor reserves these signals for its own use.
Condor transfers back all files within the temporary working directory that have been modified or created.
sentences.cn: Condor将把临时工作目录中所有被修改或创建的文件传送回去.

sentences.en: Condor's behavior in this instance is undefined.
sentences.cn: 这种情况下Condor的行为是无法预料的.

sentences.en: Condor's ClassAds are analogous to the classified advertising section of the newspaper.
sentences.cn: Condor的ClassAd类似于报纸上的分类广告专栏.

sentences.en: Condor's file transfer mechanism is disabled.
sentences.cn: Condor的文件传送机制被禁用.

sentences.en: In the standard universe , Condor provides checkpointing and remote system calls.
sentences.cn: 在标准运行模式下, Condor提供检查点和远程系统调用.

sentences.en: Just like this California condor, which—though teetering on the edge of extinction—still soars near the Grand Canyon in Arizona and in the state it was named after.
sentences.cn: 就像加利福利亚秃鹫，虽然依旧翱翔于亚利桑那和加利福利亚的大峡谷附近，但已在灭绝的悬崖边摇摇欲坠。

sentences.en: North American condor; chiefly dull black; almost extinct.
sentences.cn: 北美秃鹫; 主要是暗黑色; 几乎灭绝.

sentences.en: One example is the California condor.
sentences.cn: 有一个加利福尼亚秃鹫的例子。

sentences.en: Put condor _ compile in front of your usual link command.
sentences.cn: 最好把condor_compile放在你的日常连接命令之前.

sentences.en: The condor said: I give you good sight of mine.
sentences.cn: 秃鹰回答: “那就把我的眼力给你. ”

sentences.en: The condor soars above the mountain heights.

trans.tran_cn: 神鹰，秃鹫，秃鹰，秃鹰金币
trans.tran_en: a very large South American  vulture (= a bird that eats dead animals )
